name: part_004
file: tmp_【#Myth5years】hololive English -Myth- 5th Anniversary Concert： Fortune Spinner [HT_HUFi8DJ4]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_004.mov

scenes.description: Calliope Mori and Ninomae Ina'nis performing the song 'Sepia'.
A crystal heart descends, transitioning the stage for the next performance.
Ninomae Ina'nis performing the song 'Hyururirappa' in a kimono outfit.

subtitles.original: 言葉少なに貴方に捧ぐ
subtitles.english: I give to you silently

subtitles.original: 今に消えてしまいそうなこの命を
subtitles.english: My life that's about to burn out

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 愛おしいセピア色した
subtitles.english: Ah, and these sepia-toned nights

subtitles.original: 何より大事なこの景色を
subtitles.english: They're most precious of all

subtitles.original: もう少し見ていたいよな
subtitles.english: I wish I could see them a bit more...

subtitles.original: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy
subtitles.english: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy

subtitles.original: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me
subtitles.english: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me

subtitles.original: The angels on my shoulder still cannot agree
subtitles.english: The angels on my shoulder still cannot agree

subtitles.original: If I was somebody else, could I get everything?
subtitles.english: If I was somebody else, could I get everything?

subtitles.original: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy
subtitles.english: I'm always gonna be my own worst enemy

subtitles.original: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me
subtitles.english: Everything I ever wanted was in front of me

subtitles.original: The devils on my shoulder never let me be
subtitles.english: The devils on my shoulder never let me be

subtitles.original: Obsessing over tomorrows that I'll never see
subtitles.english: Obsessing over tomorrows that I'll never see

subtitles.original: Somebody save me
subtitles.english: Somebody save me

subtitles.original: My world is caving in cuz I thought I deserved it all for free yeah yeah
subtitles.english: My world is caving in cuz I thought I deserved it all for free yeah yeah

subtitles.original: 遠き日の夢を見るたび
subtitles.english: Every time I dream of days gone by

subtitles.original: 生まれた意味を考えてしまうの
subtitles.english: I wonder why I came to be

subtitles.original: 嗚呼 美しい青い日々だな
subtitles.english: Ah, such beautiful, youthful days

subtitles.original: この目に焼き付けておこうかな
subtitles.english: I should burn their images into my mind

subtitles.original: もう少し強くならないとな
subtitles.english: But I'd have to be a little stronger first

subtitles.original: 春嵐 今 踊り踊れ
subtitles.english: Spring storm, now dance, dance

subtitles.original: 恋焦がれ遊べ 桜って歌え
subtitles.english: Yearn for love and play, sing of cherry blossoms

subtitles.original: 花に紛れ 今を取り戻せ
subtitles.english: Disappear into the flowers, take back this moment

subtitles.original: 水興に遊べ さあここで踊れ
subtitles.english: Play with whimsy, come now, dance right here

subtitles.original: 沈む夕日 待ち人が過ぎてく
subtitles.english: The setting sun, the person I wait for passes by

subtitles.original: 色とりどり緑 酸いも甘いも祭囃子
subtitles.english: Colorful greenery, sour and sweet, the festival music

subtitles.original: あれもこれもカゴを放り込み
subtitles.english: Throwing this and that into the basket

subtitles.original: 欲にまみれ生きて痛い
subtitles.english: I want to live covered in desire till it hurts

subtitles.original: 人生より道 回り道
subtitles.english: Life is a detour, a roundabout way

subtitles.original: 行きたいように生きなはれや
subtitles.english: Live however you want to live

subtitles.english: Spring storm, now dance, dance

subtitles.english: Play with whimsy, come now, dance right here

subtitles.original: ゆるゆるりらら ゆるりらっぱ
subtitles.english: Yuru yururi rara yururirappa

subtitles.original: 散るは丁度ときは過ぎ
subtitles.english: Scattering perfectly as time passes

subtitles.original: 酸いも甘いも祭囃子
subtitles.english: Sour and sweet, the festival music

subtitles.original: 味わい尽くしてしまいましょう
subtitles.english: Let's savor it all until the end

subtitles.original: さあ 何から平らげよう
subtitles.english: Well, what shall we devour first?

subtitles.original: 人生気付けば矢の如し
subtitles.english: Life flies like an arrow before you know it

subtitles.original: 命の花を打ち上げましょう
subtitles.english: Let's launch the fireworks of life

subtitles.original: 花よ花よ
subtitles.english: Oh flower, oh flower

subtitles.original: 誇りなさい
subtitles.english: Bloom proudly

subtitles.original: 迷うことなく君のまま
subtitles.english: Without hesitation, just as you are

subtitles.original: 上を向いてごらんなさい
subtitles.english: Look up and see

subtitles.original: 最後の日まで花であれ
subtitles.english: Be a flower until the very last day
